name: The DH Group
description:
The DH Group is a full-service marketing, communications and consulting company.
Our capabilities include all of the facets needed to launch, market and sustain a successful business.
We are expert in corporate naming; logo design; corporate identity; web design; SEO; TV, Radio and Print Creative; Media Planning and Buying; broadcast reconciliation; sales reporting; sales consulting; back office setup; PR; trade events and trade show events.
